entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who is being attacked by Dolohov.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: A person who is attacking Harry with magic spells.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's friend, who intervenes to save him from Dolohov's attack.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who was previously attacked by Dolohov with the same slashing movement.

relationships.description: Dolohov is attacking Harry with magic spells, as described in the text: 'He made the same slashing movement with his wand that he had used on Hermione just as Harry yelled, “Protego!”'
Sirius intervenes to save Harry from Dolohov's attack, as described in the text: 'Sirius hurtled out of nowhere, rammed Dolohov with his shoulder, and sent him flying out of the way.'

Harry defends himself against Dolohov's attack using magic spells, as described in the text: 'Once again, Dolohov’s arms and legs snapped together and he keeled over backward, landing with a crash on his back.'
